channel.title: [PI] NPCDrop.Tsm problem [PI]
channel.description:
I've coded NPCDrops.TSM in Notepad ++ And I added bones to the drop as 526:1 and whenever I kill an NPC, I don't get bones? I don't get any drops on the server at all.
Can someone help. Willing to rep, and give MOD on server.

item.title: [PI] NPCDrop.Tsm problem [PI]
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

Hey there. I might just be able to fix this problem for you. Send me a pm and we will start. PS You don’t have to give me a position on your server =)
